    • Method Detail

      • setRegistrationWorkflowEnabled

        public CreateAccountRequestBuilder setRegistrationWorkflowEnabled(boolean registrationWorkflowEnabled)
        Description copied from interface: CreateAccountRequestBuilder
        Directive to explicitly overwrite the registration workflow of the Login Source for new Accounts.

        If registrationWorkflowEnabled is true, the account registration workflow will be triggered no matter what the Login Source configuration is.

        If registrationWorkflowEnabled is false, the account registration workflow will NOT be triggered, no matter what the Login Source configuration is.

        If you want to ensure the registration workflow behavior matches the Login Source default, just do not call this method.

        Specified by:
        setRegistrationWorkflowEnabled in interface CreateAccountRequestBuilder
        Parameters:
        registrationWorkflowEnabled - whether or not the account registration workflow will be triggered, no matter what the Login Source configuration is.
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.

      • withResponseOptions

        public CreateAccountRequestBuilder withResponseOptions(AccountOptions options)
        Description copied from interface: CreateAccountRequestBuilder
        Ensures that after a Account is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified account's options. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Specified by:
        withResponseOptions in interface CreateAccountRequestBuilder
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.

      • build

        public CreateAccountRequest build()
        Description copied from interface: CreateAccountRequestBuilder

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a new CreateAccountRequest instance based on the current builder state.
